sentences.en: Although he is an adoptive son, he is obedient.
sentences.cn: 他虽然是养子, 但是很孝顺.

sentences.en: He was brought up by adoptive parents in Kentucky.
sentences.cn: 他是被他在肯塔基州的养父母抚养大的。

sentences.en: He was brought up by adoptive parents in London.
sentences.cn: 他由养父母在伦敦抚养长大。

sentences.en: Her adoptive mother treats her better than her biological mother.
sentences.cn: 养母对她比亲生母亲还要好.

sentences.en: Her adoptive mother was a housekeeper.
His adoptive father is ill, he is anxious too.
sentences.cn: 养父生病了, 他也很担心.

sentences.en: My adoptive father is nicer to me than to his own son.
sentences.cn: 义父对我比对自己的亲生儿子还要好.

sentences.en: Please return after the adoptive mother , did not return subsequently.
sentences.cn: 后请归养母, 遂不复出.

sentences.en: Raised by adoptive parents , Hill received early encouragement in her musical proclivities.
sentences.cn: 希尔由养父母带大, 从小,她的音乐爱好就受到了鼓励.

sentences.en: She is under an obligation to her adoptive father.
sentences.cn: 她有义务赡养她的养父.

sentences.en: She is under an obligation to her adoptive mother.
sentences.cn: 她有义务赡养她的养母.

sentences.en: She lived with her adoptive father.
sentences.cn: 她和她养父生活在一起.

sentences.en: The adoptive relationship shall be established as of the date of registration.
sentences.cn: 收养关系自登记之日起成立.

sentences.en: The conference was of benefit to orphanage directors and adoptive parents alike.
sentences.cn: 这一研讨会对孤儿院院长和收养孩子的父母都十分有益.

sentences.en: They threatened to expel him from his adoptive country.
sentences.cn: 他们威胁将他驱逐出他的移居国。

sentences.en: We solve problem, adoptive way, be at: Big, inside, small city, quick.
sentences.cn: 我们解决问题, 采用的办法, 就是在: 大, 中, 小城市, 迅速.

words.tran_cn: 养父母；[化工] 接受管
采用；接受（adopt的过去式和过去分词）
采取；接受；收养；正式通过

trans.tran_cn: 收养的，有收养关系的，被采纳的，装出来的
trans.tran_en: an adoptive parent is one who has adopted a child
